subject: Re: [cc-community] Fwd: needing some copyright advice
body:
On Sat, 2007-05-12 at 20:59 -0700, Mike Linksvayer wrote:
> On Sat, 2007-05-12 at 22:45 +0100, rmbordalo rmbordalo wrote:
> > Would it be enough for example to simply state on our website
> > something like "in the moment a submission is received, it is implicit
> > that the authors took knowledge of the terms specified by the license
> > and agree with them?"
> 
> IANAL but it seems that lots of sites do this.

I should have emphasized, in particular because your subject line
implies seeking legal advice, that CC does not offer legal advice.  The
topic you raise is complicated and may differ in different jurisdictions
-- if you're concerned you should seek the advice of your counsel.

--
